channel.title: Matrix is back, it never shuts down!
channel.description:
Hey guys, Matrix is back. I've decided to bring it back, and the explanation of everything will be listed on the current site. Please do note though, that this site is temporary, we do own a real .net domain and a host, it's just that we are upgrading to vBulletin, and redoing allot of things, so this is the temporary one.
The media is the official Matrix media, it hasn't been edited I am leeching it, but to give people what they loved back. People enjoyed Matrix, and it was leaked on here, so many people will be trying to get it up. I'm not doing this for profit, I used to play myself because it gave me the learning experience for the real thing; Runescape.
Enjoy ->
http://synestia.tk/
If you think this is a virus, or will damage your computer in any way please virus scan it first.

item.description:
@heatrn11 wrote:

[quote=“synestia, post:3, topic:449634”]Aren’t you clever, a good job? Please learn to read before opening your mouth.

I've decided to bring it back, and the explanation of everything will be listed on the current site. Please do note though, that this site is temporary, we do own a real .net domain and a host, it's just that we are upgrading to vBulletin, and redoing allot of things, so this is the temporary one.
The media is the official Matrix media, it hasn't been edited I am leeching it, but to give people what they loved back.

And, no shit it’s in the wrong section. I wanted to get peoples attention. So stop rep hunting.[/quote]
Rep hunting? I’m telling you it’s in the wrong section and I’m rep hunting? I’ve had 120 rep for like 5 months, if I wanted rep I’d just work on a source.

Read full topic
